Package org.joml.sampling

Class PoissonSampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joml.sampling.PoissonSampling
  • public class PoissonSampling
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates Poisson samples.

    The algorithm implemented here is based on Fast Poisson Disk Sampling in Arbitrary Dimensions.

    Author:
    Kai Burjack

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PoissonSampling.Disk
      Generates Poisson samples on a disk.
